main.description: A declaration of a site for an organization

lat.description: Latitude of the site centerpoint as a decimal string

lon.description: Longitude of the site centerpoint as a decimal string

area.description: Area of the site in hectares as a decimal string

boundary.description: The URI pointing to the GeoJSON boundary of the site

trees.description: GeoJSON blob containing tree planting data for this site (max 10MB)
